resources:
Home Stock Manager this is a tester Personal Stock Checker Search
Welcome to the Personal Stock Manager! This is a personal stock manager app. The purpose of this app is to help to reduce the amount of wasted food consumed by keeping inventory of items. Additionally, there is a menu section that will allow for a week of meals to be planned which will further help to reduce food waste.
Menu Changer This will allow you to change the meal title for the day selected. Simply click and edit the text box to the new meal name and then press the update button. Meal name:
